pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Jeff Francis; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .308 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .341 off him after that.
Jeff Francis is trying to tie up Robert Andino with fastballs inside; Andino is hitting .286 on pitches in that location compared to .291 overall.
